docs.text: Welcome to Rick's Homepage Title   Wentao Wang (Rick) , Undergraduate Researcher   Current Position: Research Intern at CASIA   Current Education: CQUPT, Automation   Searching for a PhD position in Fall 2024 ! Email | cv | Google Scholar | Github Recent News [May 2023] Invited to be a reviewer of The 13th CAA Symposium on Fault Detection, Supervision, and Safety for Technical Processes (CAA SAFEPROCESS 2023) ! (18 Papers) [April 2023] Invited to be a reviewer of The IEEE International Conference on Advanced Robotics and Mechatronics (ICARM) ! (2 Papers) Overview Wentao Wang (Rick) is a undergraduate researcher at Chongqing University of Posts and Telecommunications . His research focuses on developing novel methodologies to improve the Medical Image Analysis and Surgical Robot Design. At present, he is working on medical image segmentation at The State Key Laboratory for Management and Control of Complex Systems , Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences, and he will join the Visual Analytics and Imaging (VAI) Lab in August 2023 to work on medical image generation. Wentao has been invited to be the reviewer of IEEE ICARM 2023 and CAA SAFEPROCESS 2023 . And Wentao's github gets 70+ stars . Education ISEP - The Institut Supérieur d’Electronique de Paris , Engineering (Exchange) , focus on Medical Robotics, Machine Learing, and Data Science Chongqing University of Posts and Telecommunications , Automation (Bachelor) , focus on Pattern recognition and Deep Learing , Average Score: 83.38/100, Comprehensive Ranking: 5/67 Experience 08/2023 , Medical Image Generation , Visual Analytics and Imaging (VAI) Lab , The State University of New York at Stony Brook (SBU). Supervisor : Prof. Klaus Mueller 07/2022——Present , Medical Image Segmentation , The State Key Laboratory for Management and Control of Complex Systems , Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences (CASIA). Supervisor : Prof. Xiao-Hu Zhou and Prof. Zeng-Guang Hou ( IEEE Fellow ) 12/2021——06/2022 , Medical Image Generation , The Smart Energy Technology Research Center, Chongqing University of Posts and Telecommunications (CQUPT). Supervisor : Prof. Ming-Jie Liu and Prof. Chang-Hao Piao Publications Wentao Wang , Xiao-Hu Zhou, Xiaoliang Xie, Shiqi Liu, De-Xing Huang, Tianyu Xiang, Hao Li, Zengguang Hou. "Double-blind anonymous manuscript" MICCAI 2023 —— 03/2023 (Reject) Mingjie Liu, Wei Zou, Wentao Wang , Cheng-Bin Jin, Junsheng Chen, Changhao Piao. Multi-Conditional Constraint Generative Adversarial Network-Based MR Imaging from CT Scan Data , Sensors —— 05/2022 (Accept) Patents China National Intellectual Property Administration (CNIPA) : An infrared medical diagnosis robot —— 02/2023 (Under review) Competitions Radiological Society of North America (RSNA) : Screening Mammography Breast Cancer Detection , Bronze Prize (TOP 10%)——02/2023 2022 National College Students' Innovation Ability Competition , Special Prize (Rank First)——12/2022 (Bonus: 1500 RMB sponsored by CQUPT and Competition Organizers) Chinese Association for Artificial Intelligence (CAAI) : The 10th College Students Digital Media Technology Works Competition , Silver Prize (TOP 10%)——11/2022 (Bonus: 1200 RMB sponsored by CQUPT) Academic Services Reviewer of The 13th CAA Symposium on Fault Detection, Supervision, and Safety for Technical Processes (CAA SAFEPROCESS 2023) ! (18 Papers)——05/2023 Reviewer of The IEEE International Conference on Advanced Robotics and Mechatronics (ICARM) ! (2 Papers)——04/2023

docs.text: Wentao Wang (Rick) is a undergraduate researcher at Chongqing University of Posts and Telecommunications . His research focuses on developing novel methodologies to improve the Medical Image Analysis and Surgical Robot Design. At present, he is working on medical image segmentation at The State Key Laboratory for Management and Control of Complex Systems , Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences, and he will join the Visual Analytics and Imaging (VAI) Lab in August 2023 to work on medical image generation.
